landing.title: SpectrumSense
landing.subtitle: Discover Your Color Perception Boundaries
landing.description: Everyone perceives color boundaries differently. This test uses binary search to find exactly where you see Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Cyan, Blue, Violet, and Pink on the color spectrum.
landing.disclaimer: Works best on a calibrated display in a neutral lighting environment.
landing.how_step1: You see a color and choose which of two adjacent color names it's closer to
landing.how_step2: Your answers drive a binary search that narrows in on each of the 8 color boundaries
landing.how_step3: Your personal color map is compared against reference colors
test.env_brightness: Set your screen brightness to maximum
test.env_nightmode: Disable Night Shift / Blue Light Filter
test.env_lighting: Use neutral ambient lighting if possible
test.instruction: Which color is this closer to?
test.refine_prompt: Want more precision? Refine your boundaries.
test.real_test_message: The real test begins now. Your responses will be recorded.
test.disclaimer: This test is not medically or scientifically validated. Unusual results do not indicate any physical condition. Please relax and choose whichever color feels closer to you.
results.title: Your Color Boundaries
results.subtitle: How your color boundaries compare to reference colors

share.disclaimer: This test is not medically or scientifically validated.
